effect_entries.effect:
Raises user's Defense by one stage.

After this move is used, the power of ice ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises user's Defense by one stage.

からだを　まるめて　ちぢこまり
じぶんの　ぼうぎょを　あげる。

몸을 둥글게 웅크려서
자신의 방어를 올린다.

Le lanceur s’enroule pour cacher ses points
faibles, ce qui augmente sa Défense.

Verbirgt Schwächen durch Einrollen und
hebt gleichzeitig den Verteidigungs-Wert.

Se enrosca para ocultar su punto débil. Sube la
Defensa.

Chi la usa si raggomitola per nascondere
i punti deboli e aumentare la propria Difesa.

The user curls up to conceal weak spots
and raise its Defense stat.
